items.name: Disable All Notifications
items.description: [Focus: FPS, Latency / Input Delay] Disables toast notifications.

items.name: Disable Animations
items.description: [Focus: FPS, Latency / Input Delay] Disables UI animations.

items.name: Disable Bluetooth Services
items.description: [Focus: FPS, Latency / Input Delay] Stops and disables Bluetooth service.

items.name: Disable Driver Searching
items.description: [Focus: FPS, Latency / Input Delay] Prevents Windows from searching Windows Update for drivers.

items.name: Disable Experimental Features
items.description: [Focus: FPS, Latency / Input Delay] Disables preview/experimental features via policy.

items.name: Disable GameDVR
items.description: [Focus: FPS, Latency / Input Delay] Disables Xbox Game Bar capture/GameDVR.

items.name: Enable Game Mode
items.description: [Focus: FPS] Enables Windows Game Mode.

items.name: Disable Xbox Services
items.description: [Focus: FPS, Latency / Input Delay] Stops and disables Xbox services.

items.name: Disable Microsoft Edge
items.description: [Focus: FPS, Latency / Input Delay] Disables Edge prelaunch/tab preloading via policy.

items.name: Disable Search Indexing
items.description: [Focus: FPS, Latency / Input Delay] Stops and disables Windows Search indexing service.

items.name: Optimize Windows Search
items.description: [Focus: FPS, Latency / Input Delay] Disables web/Bing search suggestions in Start search.

items.name: Disable Windows Updates
items.description: [Focus: FPS, Latency / Input Delay] Disables Windows Update services and NoAutoUpdate policy.

items.name: Disable Scheduled Maintenance
items.description: [Focus: FPS, Latency / Input Delay] Disables Automatic Maintenance scheduling.

items.name: Disable Scheduled Tasks
items.description: [Focus: FPS, Latency / Input Delay] Disables common telemetry scheduled tasks.

items.name: Disable Startup Delay For Apps
items.description: [Focus: FPS, Latency / Input Delay] Removes Windows startup delay for apps.

items.name: Disable Transparency Effects
items.description: [Focus: FPS, Latency / Input Delay] Disables transparency effects.

items.name: Disable Rounded Tooltips
items.description: [Focus: FPS, Latency / Input Delay] Disables balloon tips where possible.

items.name: Optimize Visual Settings
items.description: [Focus: FPS, Latency / Input Delay] Sets visual effects to performance profile.

items.name: Optimize Hung Apps
items.description: [Focus: FPS, Latency / Input Delay] Shortens hung app timeouts.

items.name: Priority Separation (Scheduler)
items.description: Controls Windows scheduler foreground boost and time slice via Win32PrioritySeparation. Balanced = stable feel; Latency = snappier input/foreground bias; FPS = more throughput/longer slices. Custom lets you enter the exact DWORD (decimal or hex like 0x26).

items.name: Configure Tsync Policy
items.description: [Focus: FPS, Latency / Input Delay] Sets kernel TscSyncPolicy (requires reboot on some systems).

items.name: Apply: Disable Hypervisor
items.description: [Focus: FPS, Latency / Input Delay] Disables Hyper-V hypervisor launch. Requires reboot.
[Focus: FPS, Latency / Input Delay] Disables Hyper-V hypervisor launch. Requires reboot.
items.name: Revert: Disable Hypervisor
Tweak Latency Tolerance
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Sets multimedia scheduling defaults for low latency.

items.name: Disable Device Power Saving
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Disables USB selective suspend.

items.name: Apply: Set Timer Resolution
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Requests 0.500ms timer resolution for the duration of the runner process (non-persistent). Prefer the persistent helper action.
[Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Requests 0.500ms timer resolution for the duration of the runner process (non-persistent). Prefer the persistent helper action.
items.name: Revert: Set Timer Resolution
Revert to Default
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Releases Falcon Optimizer's timer period request (best-effort).

steps.command: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "try { Add-Type -TypeDefinition \"using System; using System.Runtime.InteropServices; public static class T { [DllImport(\\\"winmm.dll\\\")] public static extern uint timeBeginPeriod(uint uPeriod); [DllImport(\\\"winmm.dll\\\")] public static extern uint timeEndPeriod(uint uPeriod);} \"; [T]::timeEndPeriod(1) | Out-Null } catch { }"

items.name: Windows Dark Mode
items.description: [Focus: FPS, Latency / Input Delay] Toggles Windows dark/light mode (Apps + System). Restarts Explorer to apply immediately.

items.name: Apply: Disable Dynamic Tick
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Disables dynamic tick for more consistent timers (requires reboot).
[Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Disables dynamic tick for more consistent timers (requires reboot).
items.name: Revert: Disable Dynamic Tick
Apply: TSC Sync Policy (Enhanced)
items.description: [Focus: FPS, Latency / Input Delay] Sets TSC sync policy to Enhanced (requires reboot).
[Focus: FPS, Latency / Input Delay] Sets TSC sync policy to Enhanced (requires reboot).
items.name: Revert: TSC Sync Policy (Enhanced)
Disable Power Throttling
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Disables Windows Power Throttling for better foreground performance.

items.name: Disable VBS (Virtualization Based Security)
items.description: [Focus: FPS, Latency / Input Delay] Disables VBS. Security tradeoff; may require reboot.

items.name: Disable Memory Integrity (HVCI)
items.description: [Focus: FPS, Latency / Input Delay] Disables HVCI/Memory Integrity. Security tradeoff; may require reboot.

items.name: Disable Windows Error Reporting Service
items.description: [Focus: FPS, Latency / Input Delay] Disables WER service to reduce background work.

items.name: Disable SysMain (Superfetch)
items.description: [Focus: FPS, Latency / Input Delay] Disables SysMain to reduce background disk activity.

items.name: Disable Windows Search Indexer
items.description: [Focus: FPS, Latency / Input Delay] Disables Windows Search indexing service.

items.name: Disable Diagnostics Tracking Service
items.description: [Focus: FPS, Latency / Input Delay] Disables Connected User Experiences and Telemetry service.

items.name: Apply: Disable Scheduled Maintenance
items.description: [Focus: FPS, Latency / Input Delay] Disables automatic maintenance tasks that can run in background.
[Focus: FPS, Latency / Input Delay] Disables automatic maintenance tasks that can run in background.
items.name: Revert: Disable Scheduled Maintenance
Disable Background Apps
items.description: [Focus: FPS, Latency / Input Delay] Disables background apps capability for current user.

items.name: Disable Game DVR (Global)
items.description: [Focus: FPS, Latency / Input Delay] Disables GameDVR/GameBar recording backend.

items.name: Apply: Disable Hibernation
items.description: [Focus: FPS, Latency / Input Delay] Disables hibernation (also disables Fast Startup).
[Focus: FPS, Latency / Input Delay] Disables hibernation (also disables Fast Startup).
items.name: Revert: Disable Hibernation
Disable Fast Startup
items.description: [Focus: FPS, Latency / Input Delay] Disables Fast Startup.

items.name: Disable Transparency
items.description: [Focus: FPS, Latency / Input Delay] Disables transparency effects.

items.name: Disable Startup Delay
items.description: [Focus: FPS, Latency / Input Delay] Disables Windows startup delay.

items.name: Apply: Disable NTFS Last Access Updates
items.description: [Focus: FPS, Latency / Input Delay] Disables last access timestamps on NTFS.
[Focus: FPS, Latency / Input Delay] Disables last access timestamps on NTFS.
items.name: Revert: Disable NTFS Last Access Updates
Disable Delivery Optimization
items.description: [Focus: FPS, Latency / Input Delay] Disables Delivery Optimization service.

items.name: Disable Windows Tips
items.description: [Focus: FPS, Latency / Input Delay] Disables tips, tricks, and suggestions.

items.name: Restart Explorer (Apply UI Changes)
items.description: [Focus: FPS, Latency / Input Delay] Restarts Windows Explorer to apply UI-related tweaks instantly.

items.name: Disable Windows Widgets
items.description: [Focus: FPS, Latency / Input Delay] Disables Widgets/News and Interests.

items.name: Disable Cortana
items.description: [Focus: FPS, Latency / Input Delay] Disables Cortana.

items.name: Reduce Telemetry (Policy)
items.description: [Focus: FPS, Latency / Input Delay] Sets telemetry collection to minimum (policy-based).

items.name: Disable Windows Update Auto-Reboot
items.description: [Focus: FPS, Latency / Input Delay] Reduces forced update restarts during active hours.

items.name: Disable Spectre/Meltdown Mitigations
items.description: [Focus: FPS, Latency / Input Delay] Advanced: disables CPU vulnerability mitigations for performance. Security tradeoff; reboot required.

items.name: Disable Clipboard History
items.description: [Focus: FPS, Latency / Input Delay] Disables clipboard history & sync.

items.name: Start Timer Resolution Helper (0.500ms)
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Starts a background helper that keeps 0.500ms timer resolution active until stopped.

items.name: Stop Timer Resolution Helper
items.description: [Focus: Latency / Input Delay] Stops the timer resolution helper and resets timer resolution request.

items.name: Hardware-Accelerated GPU Scheduling (HAGS)
items.description: [Focus: FPS] Toggles Hardware-Accelerated GPU Scheduling via GraphicsDrivers\HwSchMode. Can help newer GPUs; may hurt older ones.

items.name: Disable MPO (Multiplane Overlay)
items.description: [Focus: FPS, Latency / Input Delay] Disables DWM Multiplane Overlay via OverlayTestMode=5. Can fix stutter/flicker on some systems.
